data.message:
Hi.i need brings back my Facebook other which disabled 
Please help me

replies.message: Hi Bako. We disable Facebook accounts that don't follow the Facebook Terms, which can be found here: http://bit.ly/2yzrOEr. Additional reasons why your account may have been disabled are listed in this Help Center article: http://bit.ly/2gtzIZt. If you think your account was disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2kX0Xga. -Anna
But unfortunately you do not offer support for blocked or disabled account. Why is that?
